thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Bill

author: Bill
title: Bill
text:
I have had many excellent buying experiences with Banggood... they have never let me down.
Only a couple of days ago I received a package from Banggood ...anFPV transmitter...I had only ordered one ...but ... two arrived in the package.
I contacted Banggood and told them of the error... I was emailed within 4 hours by Daisy who apologised for the error and said I could have the extra item for Free as a gift from Banggood.
That is going the extra yard in customer service,,,very well done by Banggood and the team. Cheers
